name: Boiling Blood
description:
Game developed during the summer semester in the course MDJ of IST in collaboration with students from FBAUL. This is a university project and was made solely for educational purposes.

Development:
-Joaquim Quadrado IST 86455
- Miguel Gonçalves IST 86485
